CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "CR Lost"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Unqualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Lost") ), "ðŸŸ¢ Lost/Unqualified", IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified"), "ðŸŸ¢ Qualified", IF( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate)) < 5, "ðŸŸ¢ on time", IF( AND( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate)) >= 5, (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate)) <= 10 ), "ðŸŸ over 5d", IF( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(LastModifiedDate)) > 10, "ðŸ”´ over 10d", "" ) ) ) ) )
